offense.name: Deadly Precision
offense.description: Increases C. RATE by 5%.

offense.name: Keen Strike
offense.description: Increases C. DMG by 10%.

offense.name: Shield Breaker
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted to targets under Shield buffs by 25%.

offense.name: Heart of Glory
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 5% when HP is above 80%.

offense.name: Grim Resolve
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 5% when HP is less than 50%.

offense.name: Whirlwind of Death
offense.description: Increases SPD by 6 for each enemy killed by this Champion, up to 18 SPD.

offense.name: Life Drinker
offense.description: Heals by 5% of damage inflicted when attacking with HP less than 50%.

offense.name: Ruthless Ambush
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 8% for the first hit on each enemy.

offense.name: Single Out
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted to targets with less than 40% HP by 8%.

offense.name: Wrath of the Slain
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 5% for each dead ally, up to 10%.

offense.name: Cycle of Violence
offense.description: Has a 30% chance of decreasing the cooldown of a random skill by 1 turn if the damage inflicted exceeds 30% of the target's MAX HP.

offense.name: Wrath of the Dead
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 5% for each dead ally, up to 10%.

offense.name: Kill Streak
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 6% in the Arena and by 3% in all other locations, stacking up to 12%.

offense.name: Blood Shield
offense.description: Places a Shield buff on this Champion equal to 15% of the damage inflicted after each attack. Shield lasts for 1 turn.

offense.name: Flawless Execution
offense.description: Increases C. DMG by 20%.

offense.name: Methodical
offense.description: Increases the damage inflicted by this Championâ€™s default Skill by 2% each time it is used during battle. Stacks up to 10%.

offense.name: Kill Stroke
offense.description: Increases damage inflicted by 6% in the Arena and by 3% in all other locations.

offense.name: Helmsmasher
offense.description: Has a 50% chance to ignore 25% of enemy DEF. This chance increases by 1% per 1% of C. DMG over 100%.

offense.name: Giant Slayer
offense.description: Has a 30% chance of inflicting bonus damage equal to 7.5% of target MAX HP on each hit of a multi-hit Skill.

offense.name: Warmaster
offense.description: Has a 60% chance of inflicting bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's MAX HP when attacking. Damage capped vs bosses.

defense.name: Blastproof
defense.description: Decreases damage taken from AoE attacks by 5%.

defense.name: Rejuvenation
defense.description: Increases the amount of healing and the value of shields this Champion receives by 5%.

defense.name: Mighty Endurance
defense.description: Decreases damage received by 10% while under a stun, sleep, fear, true fear, or freeze debuff.

defense.name: Improved Parry
defense.description: Decreases damage received from critical hits by 8%.

defense.name: Bloodthirst
defense.description: Heals this Champion by 5% of their MAX HP when they kill an enemy.

defense.name: Resurgent
defense.description: Has a 50% chance to remove 1 random debuff when this Champion loses 25% of their MAX HP in one attack.

defense.name: Delay Death
defense.description: Decreases damage received by 0.75% per each debuff on this Champion. Stacks up to 6% reduction.

defense.name: Harvest Despair
defense.description: Has a 60% chance of placing a Leech debuff for 1 turn when placing a stun, sleep, fear, true fear, or freeze debuff.

defense.name: Wisdom of Battle
defense.description: Has a 30% chance of placing a Block Debuffs buff for 1 turn when a debuff expires on this Champion.

defense.name: Solidarity
defense.description: Increases Ally RESIST by 5 for each buff placed on this Champion.

defense.name: Stubbornness
defense.description: Increases RESIST by 10 for each debuff this Champion is under, stacking up to 30.

defense.name: Cycle of Revenge
defense.description: Has a 50% chance of increasing Turn Meter by 15% when an ally is attacked with a critical hit.

defense.name: Retribution
defense.description: Has a 50% chance to counterattack when this Champion loses 25% of their MAX HP in one attack.

defense.name: Deterrence
defense.description: Has a 20% chance to counterattack when an ally is attacked by an enemy under stun, sleep, fear, true fear, or freeze debuffs.

defense.name: Fearsome Presence
defense.description: Increases the chance of placing a stun, sleep, freeze, fear, true fear, or provoke debuff from skills or artifacts by 5%.

support.name: Charged Focus
support.description: Increases ACC by 20 when no skills are on cooldown.

support.name: Lay on Hands
support.description: Increases the value of heals this Champion casts by 5%.

support.name: Shieldbearer
support.description: Increases the value of Shield buffs this Champion casts by 5%.

support.name: Exalt in Death
support.description: Heals this Champion by 10% of their MAX HP the first time an enemy is killed in each round.

support.name: Cycle of Magic
support.description: Has a 5% chance of decreasing the cooldown of a random skill by 1 turn at the start of every turn.

support.name: Lore of Steel
support.description: Increases the Set Bonuses of Basic Artifact Sets by 15%.

support.name: Merciful Aid
support.description: Increases the amount of healing and the value of Shield buffs placed by 15% when used on allies under stun, sleep, fear, true fear, or freeze debuffs.

support.name: Rapid Response
support.description: Has a 30% chance of increasing Turn Meter by 10% when a buff cast by this Champion is removed or expires.

support.name: Healing Savior
support.description: Increases the amount of healing and value of Shield buffs placed by 10% when used on allies with less than 40% HP.

support.name: Master Hexer
support.description: Has a 30% chance to extend the duration of any debuff cast by this Champion for 1 turn.

support.name: Sniper
support.description: Increases the chance of placing any debuff from Skills or Artifacts by 5%.

support.name: Swarm Smiter
support.description: Increases ACC by 4 for each enemy alive, up to 20.

support.name: Lasting Gifts
support.description: Has a 30% chance to extend the duration of any buff cast by this Champion for 1 turn.

support.name: Spirit Haste
support.description: Increases SPD by 8 for each dead ally, up to 24.

support.name: Oppressor
support.description: Increases Turn Meter fill rate by 2.5% for each active debuff cast by this Champion, stacking up to 10%.
